title.rendered: Airblue Cargo Office in Sharjah, UAE

content.rendered:
Airblue Limited was established in 2003 (as airblue Airways), commenced operations in 18 June 2004 which is a private Pakistani low-cost airline. airblue Airways is headquartered at the 12th floor of the Islamabad Stock Exchange (ISE) Towers in Islamabad, Pakistan.

airblue operates scheduled flights linking Pakistani domestic destinations with international destinations in Oman, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.

airblue Sharjah Cargo Office Address:
Global Wide International Travel Tours and Cargo LCC
Shop 13 (Burj 2000)
Damas Building
Sharjah, UAE

Map: View direction here

Nearby Landmark for Airblue Airways Office in Sharjah: Heritage Palace Decor

Location: Airblue Airways is located in Damas Building in Sharjah

airblue Cargo Office telephone contact numbers:
  Helpline Middle East: 600 544 540

Customer Relations number: 111-AIR-BLU (247-258)
Cargo: 111-247-258
Within Pakistan : 111-AIR-BLU (247-258)
From outside Pakistan: (+92) 51 111-247-258

 Email: For assistance via email: wearelistening@airblue.com

Working hours

Map: View direction here

airblue Official website: www.airblue.com

airblue Online Check-in: https://www.airblue.com

airblue Online Check-in

www.airblue.com

Check airblue flight schedule here: www.airblue.com/flightinfo/schedule

Check airblue Airways flight status here: www.airblue.com/flightinfo/status

airblue Airways baggage services telephone contact numbers:

airblue Airways Baggage Allowance

View airblue Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Near-by Airports: Sharjah International Airport,  Dubai World Central-Al Maktoum International Airport, Abu Dhabhi International Airport (AUH), Fujairah International Airport (FJR), Al Bateen International Airport (AZI), Dubai International Airport (DXB)

Nearby Airblue Airways office in UAE:

View the nearest Airblue Airways offices in UAE and the address, phone number, website and more.

  • Airblue Agent Office in Abu Dhabi, UAE
  • Airblue Airport Office in Abu Dhabi, UAE
  • airblue Airport Office in Dubai, UAE
  • Airblue Cargo Office in Sharjah, UAE
  • Airblue City Sales office in Abu Dhabi, UAE
  • Airblue City Sales office in Dubai, UAE
  • Airblue City Sales office in Sharjah, UAE

List of Airblue Airways offices

Types of Planes / Air craft available with airblue Airways

Total fleet: 8

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A321-200
Queries handled by airblue Airways Customer care:
Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Blue Miles

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the airblue Sharjah Cargo Office Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
